entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:12 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
